mi:PackageInformation.name: Composite.Community.Raty
mi:PackageInformation.author: Composite A/S
mi:PackageInformation.Description: Allows people visiting a website to rate pages, images and other content. Based on Raty http://www.wbotelhos.com/raty/, a jQuery plugin that generates a customizable star rating automatically.
